flawed_nl_solution:
The classes in the pack cost $7.5 each because 75 / 10 = <<75/10=75>>75
An additional class costs $10 because 75 x (1 +(1/3)) = <<75*(1+(1/3))=100>>100
She buys 3 extra classes because 13 - 10 = <<13-10=3>>3
Her three additional classes cost $300 because 3 x 100 = <<3*100=300>>300
Her total cost is $375 because 75 + 300 = <<75+300=375>>375
#### 375

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 7.5, not 75. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
